description: This file defines a React component called DataTable that renders a customizable, semantic HTML table for displaying data in a web UI.

methods.name: DataTable({ columns, rows, emptyMessage = "No data", variant = "default", headerClassName = "", tableClassName = "", rowClassName, })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a semantic, customizable data table with support for different variants, headers, empty state message, and row/cell customizations.
